title: Africa: Catalyzing Momentum for Health Negotiations at COP28
description: [allAfrica] By now, there is no doubt that the climate crisis is a significant health crisis affecting people across the globe. This might be obvious to some but to others, the impacts haven't hit home yet.

title: Africa: COP28 - Humans of All Faiths (And No Faith) Have a Limited Window of Opportunity to Act On the Climate Crisis
description: [Daily Maverick] A crucial global meeting is being held from 30 November to 12 December 2023 in Dubai: the Conference of the Parties of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change - better known as COP28.

title: Africa: For the Aids Response to Succeed, Govts Need to Let Communities Lead
description: [Daily Maverick] To end Aids as a public health threat by 2030, governments and international partners need to support the communities on the frontlines of the Aids pandemic.

title: Africa: Climate Change Identified As Serious Threat in Fight to End Malaria
description: [RBM] New findings published today by the World Health Organization (WHO) in its 2023 World Malaria Report have revealed that the number of malaria cases globally rose between 2019 (pre-pandemic) and 2022. Cases rose by 16 million in this period, from 233 million to 249 million.

title: Africa: COP28 Climate 'Loss and Damage' Fund a Big Win for Uganda - WWF
description: [Nile Post] The World Wildlife Fund(WWF) Uganda has welcomed the creation of a fund to help compensate countries struggling to cope with loss and damage caused by climate change during the ongoing COP28 in Dubai.
